DOC.brief_summary: The principal objective of the study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of temsirolimus use in patients with Renal Cell Carcinoma and Mantle Cell Lymphoma.
DOC.brief_title: INHIBITOR: Retrospective Study Of Patients With Renal Cell Carcinoma And Mantle Cell Lymphoma Treated With Temsirolimus
DOC.criteria: Patients with Renal Cell Carcinoma or Mantle Cell Lymphoma that have been treated with Temsirolimus as per clinical practice. Patients that do not have a minimum (prespecified) of data in their clinical record.
